title: Torque and work - tau-theta graph for rotating bar

content.question: A uniform bar is initially at rest on a horizontal table. The bar is free to rotate horizontally with negligible friction about a vertical axle at its center, and friction between the bar and the table is negligible. A variable torque about the axle is applied to the bar, and the graph shows the applied torque as a function of the barâ€™s angular position, where positive values represent clockwise torque and position. At which two labeled points in the graph, if any, does the bar have the same rotational kinetic energy?
